Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Ohio
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand & Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand, then resume their normal route on Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Clark/Lake due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Clark/Lake due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
